overview.unique_concept: Milindor is where multiple pantheons clash, and magic comes from the friction between conflicting divine powers

creation_myth.title: La Guerra della Genesi
creation_myth.summary: Nel vuoto primordiale esistevano tre Forze Cosmiche: l'Ordine Assoluto, il Caos Primordiale e l'Equilibrio Neutrale. Quando queste forze si scontrarono, dalle loro scintille nacquero i primi dei. Ogni pantheon pretese di essere il legittimo creatore di Milindor, scatenando una guerra eterna che plasma ancora oggi la realtà.
unique_aspects: Multiple pantheons claim ownership of Milindor
Gods can be killed but their power doesn't disappear
Mortals can ascend by claiming dead gods' domains
Divine alliances shift constantly, changing reality

epochs.name: Era del Vuoto Primordiale
epochs.description: Solo le tre Forze Cosmiche esistevano nel nulla assoluto

epochs.name: Era della Prima Scintilla
epochs.description: Nascita dei Pantheon Primordiali dal conflitto delle Forze

epochs.name: Era delle Guerre Divine
epochs.description: I pantheon si combattono per il controllo della realtà nascente

epochs.name: Era degli Eroi Mortali
epochs.description: I mortali iniziano a interferire nei conflitti divini

epochs.name: Era dell'Ascensione
epochs.description: Epoca attuale - mortali possono diventare dei, equilibrio divino instabile

the_celestial_dominion.origin: Born from the Absolute Order cosmic force
the_celestial_dominion.goal: Establish perfect divine rule over all existence
the_celestial_dominion.structure: Rigid hierarchy with clear chains of command

aethros_the_throne_eternal.title: Emperor of the Celestial Dominion
aethros_the_throne_eternal.description: The supreme deity who believes perfect order is the only path to cosmic peace
aethros_the_throne_eternal.symbol: Golden throne with seven ascending steps

lumina_the_radiant_sword.title: Marshal of Divine Justice
lumina_the_radiant_sword.description: Right hand of Aethros, leads the celestial armies

lexicon_the_eternal_scribe.title: Keeper of Divine Laws
lexicon_the_eternal_scribe.description: Records all divine decrees and cosmic laws

the_primordial_chorus.origin: Emerged from the Primordial Chaos cosmic force
the_primordial_chorus.goal: Liberate all existence from the tyranny of order

vorthane_the_everchanging.title: The Shifting Crown
vorthane_the_everchanging.description: A deity who changes form, personality, and even gender constantly
vorthane_the_everchanging.symbol: Crown that shifts between different shapes

wildara_the_untamed.title: Queen of Primal Instincts
wildara_the_untamed.description: Goddess of natural chaos and untamed wilderness
wildara_the_untamed.symbol: Tree with roots and branches in constant motion

discord_the_mad_muse.title: The Inspiring Madness
discord_the_mad_muse.description: Patron of mad geniuses and revolutionary artists
discord_the_mad_muse.symbol: Palette with colors that don't exist

the_void_conspiracy.philosophy: Existence is suffering, only oblivion brings peace
the_void_conspiracy.origin: Spawned from the gaps between Order and Chaos
the_void_conspiracy.goal: Return all existence to the peaceful void

nullex_the_final_silence.title: The End of All Things
nullex_the_final_silence.description: The ultimate nihilistic deity who seeks to unmake reality
nullex_the_final_silence.symbol: Black circle that seems to absorb light

mortis_the_gentle_ending.title: The Peaceful Death
mortis_the_gentle_ending.description: Offers peaceful death as salvation from existence
mortis_the_gentle_ending.symbol: Closed eyes on a withered hand

the_balance_keepers.origin: Neutral arbiters who arose to mediate conflicts
the_balance_keepers.goal: Maintain cosmic equilibrium between all forces
the_balance_keepers.structure: Council of equals with rotating leadership

magnamount_the_wise_arbiter.title: The Cosmic Mediator
magnamount_the_wise_arbiter.description: Greatest of the Balance Keepers, patron of the Harmony Wardens
magnamount_the_wise_arbiter.symbol: Scales with infinite arms, all in perfect balance

temporis_the_eternal_moment.title: Master of Time's Flow
temporis_the_eternal_moment.description: Controls the flow of time to maintain cosmic balance
temporis_the_eternal_moment.symbol: Hourglass with sand flowing both ways

the_ascended_mortals.philosophy: Mortals can become gods through deed and will
the_ascended_mortals.goal: Prove that godhood is not birthright but achievement

valorian_the_first_ascended.title: The Mortal Who Became God
valorian_the_first_ascended.description: First mortal to achieve true godhood, inspiration for all heroes

sapientia_the_learned.title: The Scholar Goddess
sapientia_the_learned.description: Mortal wizard who ascended through pure knowledge
sapientia_the_learned.symbol: Book with pages that turn into stars

the_forgotten_pantheon.philosophy: Memory and tradition must be preserved
the_forgotten_pantheon.origin: Ancient gods from before the current age
the_forgotten_pantheon.goal: Reclaim their lost dominion over Milindor

antiquus_the_first_dreamer.title: The Ancient Memory
antiquus_the_first_dreamer.description: Oldest god, remembers the true history of creation
antiquus_the_first_dreamer.symbol: Ancient tree with faces in the bark

eternal_light.description: Forza primordiale di creazione, crescita e speranza

abyssal_dark.description: Forza primordiale di distruzione, decadimento e disperazione

primal_chaos.description: Energia grezza del cambiamento e della possibilità infinita

cosmic_order.description: Principio di struttura, legge e stabilità universale

ishir_the_lightbringer.description: Il Primo Creatore, creatore della luce e protettore dei giusti

naar_the_shadow_lord.description: Il Distruttore Primordiale, nemico giurato di tutta la creazione

kai_the_eternal_watcher.description: Patrono dei Signori della Saggezza, guardiano della saggezza e della giustizia
kai_the_eternal_watcher.symbol: Open eye surrounded by protective runes

vashna_the_death_knight.description: Primo e più potente dei Signori delle Ombre, generale supremo delle armate delle tenebre
vashna_the_death_knight.history: Once a noble paladin, corrupted by Naar's influence

giak_the_corruptor.description: Signore della corruzione e della follia, creatore delle razze goblinoidi

the_reality_tear.description: Cicatrice nella realtà dove il Vuoto Primordiale tocca Milindor

divine_impact_site.description: Dove una stella divina cadde dal regno degli dei, portando energia celeste

ley_lines.description: Correnti di energia magica che attraversano Milindor
major_nodes: Crystal Caverns of the Deep King
Bone Bridge of the Necromancer Lords
ley_lines.effects: Enhanced spellcasting, magical anomalies, creature mutations

the_sleeper_beneath.description: Ancient entity predating even the First Gods, stirring in the depths
the_sleeper_beneath.signs: Earthquakes, madness in deep places, whispers in unknown languages

the_devourer_between_stars.description: Cosmic horror that feeds on entire planes of existence
the_devourer_between_stars.signs: Stars going dark, planar barriers weakening, time distortions

the_final_shadow.description: Prophesied final Shadow Lord who will either destroy or redeem all
the_final_shadow.prophecy: When light and dark unite in one being, the age of twilight ends

battlegrounds: The Contested Peaks - mountains that shift between order and chaos
The Wavering Cities - settlements that change rulers daily
The Neutral Zones - areas where both pantheons have influence
effects_on_milindor: Weather becomes extremely unpredictable near battle sites
Magic users experience power surges and failures
Some mortals spontaneously develop divine powers

the_void_infiltration.nature: Secret war of corruption and nihilism
tactics: Creating 'void zones' where nothing can exist
signs: Areas where plants and animals refuse to live

the_ascension_persecution.cause: Traditional gods see mortal ascension as blasphemy
effects: Heroic mortals face divine trials and tests
Some gods actively try to corrupt or kill potential ascendants
New gods struggle for recognition and worshippers

the_balance_coalition.goal: Prevent any pantheon from gaining total dominance

the_existence_defenders.tension: Constantly argue about methods and goals

aethros_dominion.name: The Celestial Empire
aethros_dominion.description: Perfectly ordered realm of golden cities and eternal law
characteristics: Everything has its place and purpose
No crime or chaos can exist

vorthane_realm.name: The Ever-Shifting Expanse
vorthane_realm.description: Chaotic realm where reality changes with every thought

the_void_between.name: The Silent Eternity
the_void_between.description: Realm of absolute nothingness and peaceful oblivion
the_void_between.ultimate_threat: Can potentially consume all other planes

divine_resonance_magic.core_concept: Magic flows from conflicts between divine powers
mechanics: Stronger magic in areas of divine conflict
Spells can 'pick sides' in divine wars
Divine favor enhances related magic schools
Blasphemy against all gods grants forbidden power

magnamount_the_wise_dreamer.nature: Greatest Dream Aspect of the Sleeping Cosmic Entity
magnamount_the_wise_dreamer.description: The conscious will of the Dreamer, trying to maintain cosmic balance while asleep
magnamount_the_wise_dreamer.symbol: Sleeping eye surrounded by swirling galaxies
magnamount_the_wise_dreamer.goal: Protect the Dreamer's sleep and maintain reality stability
magnamount_the_wise_dreamer.manifestation: Appears in prophetic dreams to guide mortals

the_shattered_crown.name: La Corona Frantumata
the_shattered_crown.nature: Collective of 12 divine fragments, each representing a broken aspect of cosmic authority
the_shattered_crown.description: When the Dreamer's consciousness first cracked, it split into fragments. Some became benevolent guides, others malevolent corruptors

verdanis_the_growth_eternal.symbol: Tree whose roots and branches form infinity symbols

soleth_the_burning_justice.symbol: Scales balanced on a sword of flame

aquis_the_flowing_change.symbol: River that flows upward into stars

aeros_the_free_wind.symbol: Spiral wind carrying messages between worlds

terros_the_steadfast.symbol: Mountain that touches both earth and sky

umbros_the_hidden_truth.symbol: Eye within a maze of shadows

vorthak_the_consuming_void.corruption: Represents the Dreamer's fear of nothingness
vorthak_the_consuming_void.symbol: Black hole with screaming faces at the edge

maleth_the_beautiful_decay.corruption: Beauty that hides rot, pleasure that destroys
maleth_the_beautiful_decay.symbol: Perfect rose with roots of bone
maleth_the_beautiful_decay.influence: Corrupts through temptation and false promises

tyronis_the_iron_fist.corruption: Order taken to its extreme becomes oppression
tyronis_the_iron_fist.symbol: Crown of thorns crushing a broken chain
tyronis_the_iron_fist.influence: Creates totalitarian regimes and mind control

kharneth_the_endless_rage.corruption: Fury without purpose, destruction for its own sake
kharneth_the_endless_rage.influence: Drives beings to berserker madness and eternal war

pestis_the_creeping_rot.symbol: Withered hand reaching from diseased earth

nixor_the_false_prophet.corruption: Truth twisted into lies, hope turned to despair
nixor_the_false_prophet.symbol: Lighthouse that leads ships to destruction

the_great_contradiction.name: La Grande Contraddizione
the_great_contradiction.description: Conflict between the Shattered Crown fragments that threatens to tear reality apart

sides.goal: Reunite the Crown fragments to restore cosmic balance
Corrupt all fragments to wake the Dreamer in chaos
Wake the Dreamer intentionally to end all existence

vorthak_incarnate.name: Vorthak l'Incarnato
vorthak_incarnate.goal: Devour enough reality to create permanent void zones

the_nightmare_council.description: Alliance of the six Corrupted Crown fragments
the_nightmare_council.combined_power: Can alter fundamental laws of reality
the_nightmare_council.goal: Complete corruption of the Dreamer's consciousness

the_sleeper_stirring.name: Il Risveglio del Sognatore
the_sleeper_stirring.description: The Dreamer begins to wake, causing reality to dissolve
the_sleeper_stirring.only_solution: Either stabilize the dream or find a way to transfer consciousness

the_anti_dreamer.name: L'Anti-Sognatore
the_anti_dreamer.nature: Opposite consciousness that dreams of absolute nothingness
the_anti_dreamer.threat_level: Beyond cosmic - threatens the concept of existence itself
the_anti_dreamer.description: If the Dreamer ever meets its opposite, both will annihilate each other and everything they've ever dreamed
the_anti_dreamer.manifestation: Can only be fought in the deepest layers of consciousness
the_anti_dreamer.ultimate_battle: Requires heroes to become aspects of the Dreamer's will

the_bleeding_cathedral.description: Where the Dreamer's tears of sorrow manifest as a massive structure
the_bleeding_cathedral.properties: Enhances necromancy and divination, reveals truth through pain
the_bleeding_cathedral.guardians: Sorrow Priests who maintain the balance between grief and wisdom
the_bleeding_cathedral.danger: Overwhelming sadness can trap visitors in eternal mourning

the_spiral_library.description: Akashic Archives manifested as an impossible geometric structure
the_spiral_library.properties: Contains all knowledge that ever was or could be
the_spiral_library.guardians: Memory Keepers who protect against information overload
the_spiral_library.access_method: Can only be entered by those who've forgotten something important

the_paradox_forge.description: Where contradictory forces are hammered into impossible artifacts
the_paradox_forge.properties: Can create items that shouldn't exist (solid fire, liquid time, etc.)
the_paradox_forge.craftsmen: Paradox Smiths who work with dream logic
the_paradox_forge.creations: Weapons that can harm concepts, armor made of crystallized hope
